skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Expert in crafting intuitive user interfaces with a focus on React, ensuring seamless and engaging web experiences.

skills.title: Digital Marketing
skills.description: Strategic digital marketer, skilled in optimizing online presence, driving traffic, and enhancing user engagement for impactful campaigns.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Proficient in leveraging Webflow's power for visually stunning, responsive, and dynamic website design and development.

portfolio.title: E-commerce Shop
portfolio.description: Developed a fully functional e-commerce website using React.js, Redux, and Firebase for backend services. Implemented features such as user authentication, product browsing, cart management, and order processing. Ensured responsive design for seamless user experience across various devices.

portfolio.title: Todo List APP
portfolio.description: Developed a task management application using React.js with features like adding, editing, and deleting tasks. Implemented functionality to prioritize tasks, mark them as complete, and filter tasks based on status. Utilized local storage for data persistence and a clean user interface for optimal user experience.

portfolio.title: Weather app
portfolio.description: Created a weather application using React.js and external APIs to fetch real-time weather data. Implemented features such as location detection, displaying current weather conditions, and a 5-day forecast. Designed an intuitive user interface for easy navigation and interaction.
